com.dhj.robotics

Class Motor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhj.robotics.Motor

  • public class Motor
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that represents a single Motor. This class can be used to control the movement of a single motor with a 2 relay input. (4 relay input will be added)
    Author:
    Smitley, Garrett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Motor(com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioController gpioController, com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput relay1, com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput relay2)
      2 relay motor, assuming one relay per motor terminal (See Constructor Detail for parameter details)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void forward()
      Spins the motor forward until turned off
      void forward(long timeInMilliseconds)
      Spins the motor forwards for given length of time
      com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioController getGpioController() 
      com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput getRelay1() 
      com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput getRelay2() 
      void motorOff()
      Turns off motor by setting both relays to a low state thus forcing the same polarity to the motor poles
      void reverse()
      Spins the motor in reverse until turned off
      void reverse(long timeInMilliseconds)
      Spins the motor in reverse for a given length of time

      void setRelay1(com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput relay1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Motor

        public Motor(com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioController gpioController,
             com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput relay1,
             com.pi4j.io.gpio.GpioPinDigitalOutput relay2)
        2 relay motor, assuming one relay per motor terminal (See Constructor Detail for parameter details)
        Parameters:
        gpioController - The main Gpio Controller (usually defined within the main class)
        relay1 - Output pin associated with relay 1 (Relay1(Low)+Relay2(High) ==> Forward)
        relay2 - Output pin associated with relay 2 (Relay1(Low)+Relay2(High) ==> Forward)

    • Method Detail

      • forward

        public void forward(long timeInMilliseconds)
        Spins the motor forwards for given length of time
        Parameters:
        timeInMilliseconds - Time in milliseconds (1000 milliseconds = 1 second)

      • reverse

        public void reverse(long timeInMilliseconds)
        Spins the motor in reverse for a given length of time
        Parameters:
        timeInMilliseconds - Time in milliseconds (1000 milliseconds = 1 second)

        Spins the motor forward until turned off

      • reverse

        public void reverse()
        Spins the motor in reverse until turned off

      • motorOff

        public void motorOff()
        Turns off motor by setting both relays to a low state thus forcing the same polarity to the motor poles
